statements: SELECT * FROM SupplierPerformanceMetrics WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_id, on_time_delivery FROM SupplierPerformanceMetrics WHERE quality > 4;
SELECT quality, on_time_delivery FROM SupplierPerformanceMetrics WHERE supplier_id = 3 ORDER BY quality DESC;
SELECT * FROM SupplierPerformanceMetrics WHERE supplier_id IN (2, 4);
SELECT supplier_id, quality, on_time_delivery FROM SupplierPerformanceMetrics WHERE quality < 3 OR on_time_delivery > 0.8 ORDER BY supplier_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM SupplierPerformanceMetrics ORDER BY supplier_id DESC, on_time_delivery ASC
SELECT supplier_id, AVG(on_time_delivery) AS avg_on_time_delivery FROM SupplierPerformanceMetrics GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING AVG(on_time_delivery) > 0.9
SELECT supplier_id, SUM(on_time_delivery) AS total_on_time_delivery, SUM(quality) AS total_quality FROM SupplierPerformanceMetrics WHERE quality > 0.8 GROUP BY supplier_id ORDER BY total_quality DESC
SELECT * FROM SupplierPerformanceMetrics WHERE on_time_delivery >= 0.95 AND quality >= 0.85

SELECT supplier_id, on_time_delivery, quality, CASE WHEN on_time_delivery >= 0.9 THEN 'Excellent' WHEN on_time_delivery >= 0.8 THEN 'Good' ELSE 'Needs Improvement' END AS delivery_performance FROM SupplierPerformanceMetrics
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance_metrics;
SELECT supplier_id, on_time_delivery_metric, quality_metric FROM supplier_performance_metrics;
SELECT contact_name, email FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance_metrics ORDER BY on_time_delivery_metric DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, AVG(quality_metric) AS average_quality FROM supplier_performance_metrics GROUP BY supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_id, on_time_delivery_metric, quality_metric FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance_metrics ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT contact_name, email FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT supplier_id, quality_metric, on_time_delivery_metric FROM supplier_performance_metrics ORDER BY quality_metric ASC;
SELECT supplier_id, on_time_delivery_metric, quality_metric FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE on_time_delivery_metric > 0.9;
SELECT * FROM supplier_metrics ORDER BY on_time_delivery_rate DESC, quality_rating ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT supplier_id, quality_rating, on_time_delivery_rate FROM supplier_metrics WHERE on_time_delivery_rate > 0.9;
SELECT supplier_id, SUM(goods_quality_rating) as total_quality_rating FROM quality_metrics GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING total_quality_rating > 50;
SELECT supplier_id, AVG(on_time_delivery_rate) as avg_on_time_delivery_rate FROM supplier_metrics;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_date, delivery_status FROM delivery_history ORDER BY delivery_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT supplier_id, on_time_delivery_rate FROM supplier_metrics ORDER BY on_time_delivery_rate DESC
SELECT * FROM delivery_history WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered' AND delivery_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT supplier_id, quality_rating FROM supplier_metrics WHERE quality_rating > 4
SELECT supplier_id, goods_quality_rating FROM quality_metrics WHERE goods_quality_rating BETWEEN 3 AND 5
SELECT * FROM delivery_history ORDER BY delivery_date DESC
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM deliveries ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, rating_id, overall_rating FROM suppliers JOIN supplier_ratings ON suppliers.supplier_id = supplier_ratings.supplier_id;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM quality_metrics WHERE metric_value > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT delivery_date, delivery_quantity FROM deliveries WHERE delivery_quantity > 100 ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM quality_metrics WHERE metric_value > 4.0;
SELECT supplier_name, overall_rating FROM suppliers INNER JOIN supplier_ratings ON suppliers.supplier_id = supplier_ratings.supplier_id ORDER BY overall_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, quality_rating FROM Suppliers ORDER BY quality_rating DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_date, status FROM Deliveries ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT supplier_id, AVG(quality_rating) AS avg_quality_rating FROM QualityMetrics GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING avg_quality_rating > 4;
SELECT supplier_name, quality_rating FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, supplier_id, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Deliveries WHERE status = 'Delivered' AND delivery_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier_id, AVG(quality_rating) AS avg_quality_rating FROM QualityMetrics GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING AVG(quality_rating) > 4;

SELECT s.supplier_name, d.status, dp.on_time FROM Suppliers s JOIN Orders o ON s.supplier_id = o.supplier_id JOIN Deliveries d ON o.order_id = d.order_id JOIN DeliveryPerformance dp ON d.delivery_id = dp.delivery_id WHERE dp.on_time = TRUE AND s.quality_rating > 4;
